params.name: query
params.doc: Query options. See [API Query Language](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/getting-started/api-query-language) for more details.

docs.summary: Retrieves a list of guests according to the provided filters and paging.

examples.title: Query RSVP-type guests without guest details
Query Buyer-type guests with guest details
Query Ticket Holder-type guests with guest details

messages.name: _wix_events_guests_v1_EventGuestDeletedDomainEvent
messages.displayName: Event Guest Deleted Domain Event Object

members.name: entityId
members.doc: EventGuest ID associated with this event.

members.name: triggeredByAnonymizeRequest
members.doc: Whether this event was triggered as a result of a privacy regulation application (e.g., GDPR).

members.name: originatedFrom
members.doc: If present, indicates the action that triggered the event.

messages.name: _wix_events_guests_v1_NotifyGuestActionDomainEvent
messages.displayName: Notify Guest Action Domain Event Object

members.name: entityId
members.doc: NotifyGuestAction ID associated with this event.

members.name: triggeredByAnonymizeRequest
members.doc: Whether this event was triggered as a result of a privacy regulation application (e.g., GDPR).

members.name: originatedFrom

messages.name: _wix_events_guests_v1_NotifyGuestActionActionEvent
messages.displayName: Notify Guest Action Action Event Object

members.name: bodyAsJson
members.doc: Event body as a stringified JSON

members.name: limit
members.doc: Number of items to load per page.

members.name: offset
members.doc: Number of items to skip in the current sort order.

members.name: limit
members.doc: Number of items to load per page.

members.name: cursor
members.doc:
Pointer to the next or previous page in the list of results.

You can get the relevant cursor token
from the `pagingMetadata` object in the previous call's response.
Not relevant for the first request.

members.name: count
members.doc: Number of items returned in the response.

members.name: total
members.doc: Total number of items that match the query. Returned if offset paging is used and the `tooManyToCount` flag is not set.

members.name: tooManyToCount
members.doc: Flag that indicates the server failed to calculate the `total` field.

members.name: cursors
members.doc: Cursors to navigate through the result pages using `next` and `prev`. Returned if cursor paging is used.

members.name: next
members.doc: Cursor pointing to next page in the list of results.

members.name: prev
members.doc: Cursor pointing to previous page in the list of results.

members.name: fieldName
members.doc: Name of the field to sort by.

members.name: filter
members.doc:
Filter object in the following format:
`"filter" : { "fieldName1": "value1", "fieldName2":{"$operator":"value2"} }`.

**Example:**
`"filter" : { "eventId": "sd3f-jhds-4fs77", "ticketNumber": {"$startsWith":"478"} }`

See [supported fields and operators](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/wix-events/wix-events/filter-and-sort) for more information.

members.name: sort
members.doc:
Sort object in the following format:
`[{"fieldName":"sortField1"},{"fieldName":"sortField2","direction":"DESC"}]`

**Example:**
`[{"fieldName":"createdDate","direction":"DESC"}]`

See [supported fields](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/wix-events/wix-events/filter-and-sort) for more information.

members.name: fieldsets
members.doc:
Currently the only supported fieldset is `guestDetails`. The `WIX_EVENTS.READ_GUESTS_DETAILS` permission is required to access the guest details.

See [field projection](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/getting-started/field-projection) for more information.

members.name: paging
members.doc: Paging options to limit and skip the number of items.

members.name: cursorPaging
members.doc: Cursor token pointing to a page of results. Not used in the first request. Following requests use the cursor token and not `filter` or `sort`.

members.name: subdivision
members.doc: Subdivision. Usually a state, region, prefecture, or province code, according to [ISO 3166-2](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-2).

members.name: addressLine2
members.doc: Free text providing more detailed address info. Usually contains Apt, Suite, and Floor.

members.name: addressLine
members.doc: Main address line, usually street and number as free text.

members.name: inputValues
members.doc: Input values entered upon ticket order.

members.name: rsvpId
members.doc:
RSVP ID.

**Note:** Only applicable when `guestType` is `RSVP`.

members.name: orderNumber
members.doc:
Order number.

**Note:** Only applicable when `guestType` is `BUYER` or `TICKET_HOLDER`.

members.name: ticketNumber
members.doc:
Ticket number.

**Note:** Only applicable when `guestType` is `TICKET_HOLDER`.

members.name: tickets
members.doc: List of ticket numbers for one order.

members.name: contactId
members.doc: Guest's contact ID. See [Contacts API](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/contacts/contacts/contacts-v4) for more details.

members.name: guestDetails
members.doc:
Guest details.

**Note:** Will not appear in the response unless the `guestDetails` fieldset will be sent in the request.

members.name: attendanceStatus
members.doc:
Attendance status.

**Note:** For `guestType` `BUYER` or `TICKET_HOLDER` the `IN_WAITLIST` value is not applicable.

members.name: secondaryLanguageCode
members.doc: Secondary language code in [ISO 639-1](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_ISO_639-1_codes) format. Used when the event ticket should be translated into another language.

members.name: createdDate
members.doc: Date and time when the guest was created in `yyyy-mm-ddThh:mm:sssZ` format.

members.name: updatedDate
members.doc: Date and time of guest's latest update in `yyyy-mm-ddThh:mm:sssZ` format.

members.name: attendanceStatusUpdatedDate
members.doc: Date and time of guest's latest attendance status update.

members.name: guestType
members.doc:
Guest type:

`RSVP`: An invited guest, no ticket necessary.

`BUYER`: The guest who bought the tickets.

`TICKET_HOLDER`: The guest for which the ticket was bought.

members.name: checkedIn
members.doc: Whether the guest has checked into the event.

members.name: onlineConferencingLogin
members.doc: Guest personal URL and password to online conference

members.name: timestamp
members.doc: Event deleted timestamp in ISO UTC format.

members.name: currency
members.doc: ISO 4217 format of the currency i.e. `USD`.

members.name: value
members.doc: Monetary amount. Decimal string with a period as a decimal separator (e.g., 3.99). Optionally, a single (-), to indicate that the amount is negative.

members.name: index
members.doc: Index in the RSVP guest list.

members.name: timestamp
members.doc: RSVP created timestamp in ISO UTC format.

members.name: silent
members.doc: Notifications silenced for this domain event.

members.name: contactId
members.doc: Contact ID associated with this RSVP.

members.name: memberId
members.doc: Member ID associated with this RSVP.

members.name: onlineConferencingLogin
members.doc: URL and password to online conference

members.name: timestamp
members.doc: RSVP updated timestamp in ISO UTC format.

members.name: contactId
members.doc: Contact ID associated with this RSVP.

members.name: memberId
members.doc: Member ID associated with this RSVP.

members.name: onlineConferencingLogin
members.doc: URL and password to online conference

members.name: timestamp
members.doc: RSVP deleted timestamp in ISO UTC format.

members.name: contactId
members.doc: Contact ID associated with this RSVP.

members.name: memberId
members.doc: Member ID associated with this RSVP.

members.name: anonymized
members.doc: Whether RSVP was anonymized by GDPR delete.

members.name: contactId
members.doc: Contact ID associated with this ticket.

members.name: memberId
members.doc: Member ID associated with this ticket.

members.name: form
members.doc: Ticket form response (only assigned tickets contain separate forms).

members.name: anonymized
members.doc: Anonymized tickets no longer contain personally identifiable information (PII).

members.name: onlineConferencingLogin
members.doc: URL and password to online conference

members.name: timestamp
members.doc: Order updated timestamp in ISO UTC format.

members.name: contactId
members.doc: Contact ID associated with this order.

members.name: memberId
members.doc: Member ID associated with this order.

members.name: confirmed
members.doc: Whether order is confirmed - occurs once payment gateway processes the payment and funds reach merchant's account.

members.name: method
members.doc: Payment method used for paid tickets purchase, i.e. "payPal", "creditCard", etc.

members.name: archived
members.doc: Whether order was archived and excluded from results.

members.name: triggeredByAnonymizeRequest
members.doc: Whether event was triggered by GDPR delete request.

members.name: timestamp
members.doc: Order deleted timestamp in ISO UTC format.

members.name: contactId
members.doc: Contact ID associated with this order

members.name: memberId
members.doc: Member ID associated with this order.

members.name: anonymized
members.doc: Whether order was anonymized by GDPR delete.

members.name: triggeredByAnonymizeRequest
members.doc: Whether event was triggered by GDPR delete request.

members.name: percentDiscount
members.doc: Discount by percentage applied to tickets.

members.name: total
members.doc: Total price for line items. Always equal to price * quantity.

members.name: discount
members.doc: Discount applied to the line item.

members.name: subTotal
members.doc: Total cart amount before discount, tax, and fees.

members.name: grandTotal
members.doc:
Total amount of cart after discount, tax, and fees.
 Grand total is calculated in the following order:
   1. Total prices of all items in the cart are calculated.
   2. Discount is subtracted from the cart (if applicable).
   3. Tax is added (if applicable).
   4. Wix service fee is added.

members.name: revenue
members.doc: Total revenue, excluding fees. (Taxes and payment provider fees are not deducted).

members.name: previewUrl
members.doc: URL to invoice preview. Returned only if order is paid.

members.name: timestamp
members.doc: Order confirmation timestamp in ISO UTC.

members.name: silent
members.doc: Notifications silenced for this domain event.

members.name: contactId
members.doc: Contact ID associated with this order.

members.name: memberId
members.doc: Member ID associated with this order.

members.name: method
members.doc: Payment method used for paid tickets purchase, i.e. "payPal", "creditCard", etc.

members.name: reservationId
members.doc: Reservation ID associated with this order.

members.name: query
members.doc: Query options. See [API Query Language](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/getting-started/api-query-language) for more details.

docs.summary:
Possible values are:
  • UNKNOWN_SUBDIVISION_TYPE
  • ADMINISTRATIVE_AREA_LEVEL_1 - State
  • ADMINISTRATIVE_AREA_LEVEL_2 - County
  • ADMINISTRATIVE_AREA_LEVEL_3 - City/town
  • ADMINISTRATIVE_AREA_LEVEL_4 - Neighborhood/quarter
  • ADMINISTRATIVE_AREA_LEVEL_5 - Street/block
  • COUNTRY - ADMINISTRATIVE_AREA_LEVEL_0. Indicates the national political entity, and is typically the highest order type returned by the Geocoder.

Possible values are:
  • NOT_ATTENDING - Not attending.
  • ATTENDING - Attending.
  • IN_WAITLIST - In a waiting list.

Possible values are:
  • RSVP - Rsvp guest.
  • BUYER - Buyer guest.
  • TICKET_HOLDER - Ticket holder guest.

Possible values are:
  • INCLUDED - Tax is included in the ticket price
  • ADDED - Tax is added to the order at the checkout
  • ADDED_AT_CHECKOUT - Tax is added to the final total at the checkout

Possible values are:
  • FEE_ADDED - Fee is added to the ticket price at checkout
  • FEE_INCLUDED - Seller absorbs the fee. It is deducted from the ticket price
  • FEE_ADDED_AT_CHECKOUT - Fee is added to the ticket price at checkout

Possible values are:
  • YES
  • NO
  • WAITING

Possible values are:
  • NA_ORDER_STATUS - Order status not available for this request fieldset
  • FREE - Order is confirmed, no payment required
  • PENDING - Order was paid but payment gateway suspended the payment. Eventually changes to PAID
  • PAID - Order paid via payment gateway
  • OFFLINE_PENDING - Order confirmed but has to be paid via offline payment and status manually updated to PAID
  • INITIATED - Order is awaiting for payment in Cashier
  • CANCELED - Order was canceled
  • DECLINED - Order payment was declined

Possible values are:
  • UNASSIGNED_TICKETS - Buyer form is used for all tickets
  • ASSIGNED_TICKETS - Each order ticket has its own form

Possible values are:
  • WIX_FEE - Wix service fee charges applied to the line item.

Possible values are:
  • UNKNOWN
  • EMAIL
  • AUTOMATION_TRIGGER
